Articles.Content:
Since there was no videos forum this seemed like the best place to put it

My name is Smitty6166 and I represent my youtube Channel Bedfordshire Gamers. http://www.youtube.com/bedfordshiregamers

Now recently I started doing a lets play of Kerbal Space Program. so I thought I'd share it with you all here http://youtu.be/zTmh03oDbg8

Obviously I will be terrible so any advice you can give would be appreciated and if you all would be so kind as to comment on the video so I'll see it there first I would appreciate it more.

thanks and enjoy

Smitty6166

Since there was no videos forum this seemed like the best place to put it
